data.lyric:
[ti:hoax]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]

[00:00.00]hoax - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:00.08]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:00.17]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:00.26]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:00.31]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:00.35]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.47]Vocals recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA)
[00:00.58]Mixed by：Jonathan Low at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.67]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:00.77]Piano, acoustic guitar, electric guitar, OP1 and synth bass by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:00.91]Orchestration by：Rob Moose (Brooklyn, NY)
[00:00.96]Viola and Violin by：Rob Moose (Brooklyn, NY) recorded by Rob Moose
[00:01.14]My only one
[00:03.19]
[00:04.91]My smoking gun
[00:07.39]
[00:08.92]My eclipsed sun
[00:11.75]This has broken me down
[00:15.34]
[00:16.83]My twisted knife
[00:19.67]
[00:20.99]My sleepless night
[00:23.93]
[00:24.97]My winless fight
[00:27.89]This has frozen my ground
[00:31.68]
[00:33.73]Stood on the cliffside
[00:36.34]Screaming give me a reason
[00:40.51]
[00:41.81]Your faithless love's the only hoax
[00:46.37]I believe in
[00:48.44]
[00:49.81]Don't want no other shade of blue
[00:54.48]But you
[00:55.74]
[00:58.06]No other sadness in the world would do
[01:03.82]
[01:05.42]My best laid plan
[01:07.97]
[01:09.39]Your sleight of hand
[01:12.01]
[01:13.45]My barren land
[01:16.32]I am ash from your fire
[01:20.17]
[01:22.17]Stood on the cliffside
[01:24.79]Screaming give me a reason
[01:28.99]
[01:30.25]Your faithless love's the only hoax
[01:34.75]I believe in
[01:36.87]
[01:38.27]Don't want no other shade of blue
[01:42.95]But you
[01:44.05]
[01:46.48]No other sadness in the world would do
[01:52.47]
[01:55.49]You know I left a part of me back in New York
[01:58.86]
[01:59.52]You knew the hero died so what's the movie for
[02:02.66]
[02:03.53]You knew it still hurts underneath my scars
[02:06.91]From when they pulled me apart
[02:08.91]
[02:11.61]You knew the password so I let you in the door
[02:14.91]
[02:15.56]You knew you won so what's the point of keeping score
[02:19.00]
[02:19.61]You knew it still hurts underneath my scars
[02:22.92]From when they pulled me apart
[02:24.96]But what you did was just as dark
[02:27.83]
[02:33.07]Darling this was just as hard
[02:35.66]
[02:37.08]As when they pulled me apart
[02:39.88]
[02:42.42]My only one
[02:44.74]
[02:46.44]My kingdom come undone
[02:49.38]
[02:50.41]My broken drum
[02:53.05]You have beaten my heart
[02:57.13]
[02:59.19]Don't want no other shade of blue
[03:03.84]But you
[03:05.12]
[03:07.30]No other sadness in the world would do
data.trans:
[ti:hoax]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.08]//
[00:00.17]//
[00:00.26]//
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.58]//
[00:00.67]//
[00:00.77]//
[00:00.91]//
[00:00.96]//
[00:01.14]我的 独一无二的唯一
[00:04.91]我的 确信无疑的证据
[00:08.92]我的 黯然失色的阳光
[00:11.75]这已将我彻底摧毁
[00:16.83]我的 遍体鳞伤
[00:20.99]我的 无眠的夜
[00:24.97]我的 毫无胜算的争吵
[00:27.89]这已让我心灰意冷
[00:33.73]我伫立在悬崖边
[00:36.34]呐喊着 给我一个理由
[00:41.81]你朝三暮四的爱 是我唯一坚信的骗局
[00:46.37]我却深信不疑
[00:49.81]我已经不堪重负 痛不欲生
[00:54.48]除你之外
[00:58.06]世间再无别的什么让我这般悲痛欲绝
[01:05.42]我的 天衣无缝的计划
[01:09.39]你的 摄人心魄的花招
[01:13.45]我的 荒芜寂寥的心
[01:16.32]你的热情将我烧成灰烬
[01:22.17]我伫立在悬崖边
[01:24.79]呐喊着 给我一个理由
[01:30.25]你朝三暮四的爱 是我唯一坚信的骗局
[01:34.75]我却深信不疑
[01:38.27]我已经不堪重负 痛不欲生
[01:42.95]除你之外
[01:46.48]世间再无别的什么让我这般悲痛欲绝
[01:55.49]你知道 我的心留在了纽约
[01:59.52]你知道英雄殒命 这电影就变得毫无意义
[02:03.53]你知道 真相让我伤心难过
[02:06.91]时至今日 伤痕累累的心依旧隐隐作痛
[02:11.61]你知道走进我心里的密码 所以我向你敞开心扉
[02:15.56]你知道你大获全胜 可立于不败之地也无济于事
[02:19.61]你知道 真相让我伤心难过
[02:22.92]时至今日 伤痕累累的心依旧隐隐作痛
[02:24.96]可你所做的一切也同样卑鄙
[02:33.07]亲爱的 你体会到我得知真相时
[02:37.08]那样的锥心之痛
[02:42.42]我的 独一无二的唯一
[02:46.44]我的王国 轰然崩塌
[02:50.41]我的 断断续续的鼓声
[02:53.05]你深深地伤了我的心
[02:59.19]我已经不堪重负 痛不欲生
[03:03.84]除你之外
[03:07.30]世间再无别的什么让我这般悲痛欲绝
